attributes.action: fully investigate why a single mother was fined £75 for littering after her 4 year old daughter dropped a piece of sausage roll on the pavement
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This follows a story in the Daily Mirror on 25/04/08, which reports on the incident in the centre of Hull. 

The mother in question said of the incident "a tiny bit missed her mouth. Some pigeons flew down and grabbed it." 

That she was then fined by council snoops just does not seem to make any sense.

Surely Hull Council and it's Environment Crime Unit have better things to be doing?
